concept.title: 5349.402-3 Procedure for Default

li.p: (f) Prior to making a final decision concerning termination for default, the contracting officer must forward the termination notice and the complete contract file to AF/JACQ with a copy of the termination notice to SAF/GCR and follow the procedures in AFFARS 5333.291 (b).
